Production Co: The Funny One LLC, Rhino Films, Sea Dragon Ltd., Endless Entertainment Inc.
Rating: R (Some Substance Abuse|Crude Sexual Humor|Parody Violence|Language)
Synopsis: In this horror parody, a masked serial killer menaces the town of Bulimia Falls with various sharp objects. Attention-seeking television personality Hagitha Utslay (Tiffani-Amber Thiessen) is soon on the scene, reporting on the ever-growing body count. Former mall security guard Doughy (Tom Arnold) shows up to protect the teenage population, but he's clearly not much help, allowing the murderer to pick off even more hapless kids as numerous scary movies are referenced.
Title: Shriek If You Know What I Did Last Friday the 13th
